items.text_for_match: Ex-Real Madrid & Everton winger Drenthe suffers stroke Former Real Madrid and Everton winger Royston Drenthe is in hospital after suffering a stroke. Former Real Madrid and Everton winger Royston Drenthe is in hospital after suffering a stroke.

items.ja: Amorim's big moment - are Man Utd finally ready for lift off?
items.en: Amorim's big moment - are Man Utd finally ready for lift off?
items.text_for_match: Amorim's big moment - are Man Utd finally ready for lift off? Finally, at Anfield, home of Manchester United's - historically and statistically - biggest rivals, Ruben Amorim's team delivered a statement win.
